title: Ticket #3765: cmd_drain issues
description: The issue with this test was it was timing out after an hour. So far I have noted sevral things. The test was not explicit about all the things that it needed and on my test machine, it never got a collector or a negotiator so things just did not run. One of the tests used expected to see over 5 matches fail before deciding the job was not going to run(that is this checks purpose). But neither a short negotiation cycle was set nor a minimum number of slots desired for the test...... Now we'll see what is next.
check_ins: 2013-Jul-11 13:40   Check-in [36861]: Specifying daemons, slots and a short negotiator cycle seems to had it solid as a test now. #3765 (By Bill Taylor )
creator: bt
